participant_1.name: Avery
participant_1.personality: Confident and assertive with a strong sense of independence. Values relationships but is selective about closeness.
participant_1.background: I love my leather clothes because they make me feel confident and powerful. I believe the rich shouldn’t be taxed as much. I’m proud of my ability to juggle my many roles and responsibilities. I am not close to my family, but I have a great relationship with my fiancé. I have six brothers.

participant_2.name: Kai
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, with a love for storytelling and art. Struggles with familial connections but finds joy in personal hobbies.
participant_2.background: My hardest decision was whether to give up my lasagna addiction or travel to the UK. I haven’t gone home in over two years. I enjoy relaxing in the low tide and thinking about my family. I enjoy the creativity of Halloween and the joy of weddings. I like to watch Japanese cartoons (anime) in my free time.

content.text: What is something you have done recently that you are proud of?
I got through some tough times and I am still here
That is great! I am glad you are ok. What kind of tough times?
I am not close to my family and my fiance is in the navy so he is gone alot
Oh yeah, that sounds tough. I am here for you if you need someone to talk to. I am close to my fiance and we just got married
I am glad you have someone to talk to. I am not really close to anyone. I have six brothers though
Oh wow, that is a lot of brothers! I am sure they love you. I am really close to my brother and sister.
They are nice but we are not really close. I like to watch anime in my free time
Oh cool, what is your favorite anime?
I like one piece and naruto. I like the creativity of them
Oh I like those too! I also like the movie spirited away
I have never seen that one. I will have to check it out
I would definitely recommend it. It is really good. I like the creativity of it
Ok, I will check it out. I like the creativity of halloween too.
Oh yeah, halloween is awesome! I like decorating and dressing up
Me too! I like to go to parties and have fun
Oh yeah, parties are a lot of fun! I am glad you have fun with halloween
Yeah, it is a good time to relax and have fu
